text:
Please rate the extension if you like it, if you donâ€™t like it feel free to air your grievances here, in the github issues, or by using the support system on chrome web store. More ratings mean people can find the extension easier. More people finding it means more people improving it, which means more features and faster bug fixes.

Not telling you how to rate -rate honestly, but if you have a significant issue with it post it here, github issues, or support to let us have a wack at fixing the issue or atleast talk to you about it.
